description:
Terrakion is known as the Cavern Pokémon. It resembles an ox. It is closely related to Cobalion and Virizion. It can be found in a deep, hidden chamber of the Victory Road after winning the trust of Cobalion.
Legends say that it, along with Cobalion and Virizion, fought for the rights of Pokémon against the humans that were abusing them.
Terrakion is one of the members of the Sacred Swordsman and was one of the Pokémon that helped Keldeo learn the true weight of its sword to become part of the Sacred Swordsman. Terrakion is a very strong Pokémon who is jolly and likes to have a fun time.
name: Terrakion
